name: Fotografiska
description: Contemporary photography museum with stunning views over Stockholm. Great café on the top floor with panoramic city views.

name: Tantolunden Dog Park
description: Large off-leash dog park with separate areas for small and large dogs. Beautiful waterfront location with great views.

name: Hermans Vegetarian Restaurant
description: Amazing vegetarian buffet with incredible views over Stockholm. Perfect for lunch with a view. Try the salad bar!

name: Nacka Nature Reserve
description: Beautiful forest area perfect for hiking and nature walks. Multiple trails of varying difficulty. Great for escaping the city.

name: Djurgården
description: Large island park perfect for walking, cycling, and picnics. Home to many museums and the beautiful Rosendal Garden.

name: Drop Coffee Roasters
description: Excellent specialty coffee roaster in Södermalm. Perfect for coffee lovers who appreciate quality beans and expert brewing.

name: Monteliusvägen Viewpoint
description: Famous walking path with stunning panoramic views over Lake Mälaren and Stockholm's skyline. Best at sunset!

name: Långholmen Beach
description: Small sandy beach in the city center. Perfect for summer swimming and sunbathing. Very popular with locals.

name: Södermalm Shopping District
description: Trendy shopping area with unique boutiques, vintage stores, and local design shops. Great for finding Swedish design pieces.

name: Rålambshovsparken
description: Popular park for dog walking with open fields and waterfront access. Great for both dogs and their owners to socialize.
